name: Caveman Crabsketball
description:
Caveman Crabsketball is a local co-op puzzle platformer where you play as either a Caveman or a Crabsketball. Work together to reach the crabsketball hoop at the end of each level!

Controls:
Caveman:
Left & Right arrows to move
Left mouse to grab/drop the crabsketball
Hold right mouse to aim the crabsketball
Left click while aiming to throw the crabsketball

Crabsketball:
A & D to Move
Space to Jump
Watch out for Spikes and the Caveman!

Team Members:
Brennan Crowder - Developer
Jacob Sharp - Developer & Art

Made in 24 hours

2022 Back to School Jam Submission
Theme: "Multiplayer"
